About Us

The Gambia Scrabble Federation (GSF) is the official governing body for Scrabble in The Gambia, dedicated to promoting excellence and fair competition in wordplay across our nation.

Founded with a vision to elevate Scrabble from a casual pastime to a recognized competitive sport, we organize tournaments, recognize champions, and prepare our finest players for international competitions including the prestigious World English Scrabble Players Championship (WESPAC) – the World Scrabble Championship organized by WESPA (World English-Language Scrabble Players Association).

As a proud member of PANASA (Pan-African Scrabble Association), we actively participate in continental competitions and collaborate with fellow African nations to promote Scrabble excellence across the continent.

Our mission extends beyond competition – we foster communities, build vocabulary skills, and create opportunities for players of all skill levels to engage with the beautiful complexity of language through Scrabble.

target

Our Mission

Provision of the Total Scrabble Experience for Gambians of all age groups and skill level towards building a federation of word smiths. Ensure youth development in the Scrabble game and become a top priority.

visibility

Our Vision

A formidable federation of word warriors for friendship and sportsmanship that makes Scrabble a national sport and an educational pastime.

star
